Description.Text:
Property Location
Apartments on Flemington is in the heart of North Melbourne, walking distance from Royal Women's Hospital and Royal Melbourne Hospital. This family-friendly apartment is close to Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex and Melbourne Cricket Ground.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 18 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. LCD televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include microwaves and sofa beds, and housekeeping is provided weekly.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and barbecue grills.

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include luggage storage and laundry facilities. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Apartments on Flemington is in the heart of North Melbourne, walking distance from Royal Women's Hospital and Royal Melbourne Hospital. This family-friendly apartment is close to Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex and Melbourne Cricket Ground.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Royal Women's Hospital - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Royal Melbourne Hospital - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Royal Children's Hospital - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
University of Melbourne - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Royal Park - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Ian Potter Museum of Art - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Queen Victoria Market - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Melbourne Zoo - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Melbourne City Baths - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Flagstaff Gardens - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
State Netball Hockey Centre - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
RMIT University - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Old Melbourne Gaol - 1.7 km / 1 mi
State Library of Victoria - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Melbourne Central - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi

The preferred airport for Apartments on Flemington is Melbourne, VIC (MEL-Tullamarine) - 16.8 km / 10.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
